TopicTitle: Mods that add new inner planets

Articles.Content:
I've gotten bored of the same planets and moons, over and over again i send missions. I have OPM and GPP secondary but i want something that adds new inner planets yet leaves the stock ones safe

EDIT: kinda like OPM but "Inner Planets Expansion"

EDIT 2: o flip there IS an Inner Planets Mod

EDIT 3: nevermind it changes the stock system, and it hasnt been updated in 4ish years
There's Minor Planets Expansion that adds both inner and outer minor planets.
